faqs.question: What is the first thing I see when I start the app for the first time?
faqs.answer: You'll be greeted with an onboarding screen that guides you through the basics of the app over three pages.

faqs.question: How do I get to the Home Screen?
faqs.answer: Simply tap on 'skip' during the onboarding process, and you'll be taken directly to the Home Screen, which is the 'Garden' tab.

faqs.question: How do I add a new garden?
faqs.answer: Tap the plus button at the bottom of the screen in the garden tab. You'll be asked if you want to create a virtual garden or just keep a list of your plants.

faqs.question: What options do I have for my virtual garden?
faqs.answer: You can select a garden size up to 18x8, add plants, delete plants, and view a list of all the plants.

faqs.question: What happens when I tap on a garden bed?
faqs.answer: Tapping on a garden bed cell will take you to either a virtual garden or a garden plant list, depending on your setup.

faqs.question: How can I tell the difference between a garden that uses a virtual garden bed versus one that does not?
faqs.answer: A garden bed that uses a virtual garden bed will have the garden bed size while a garden without a virtual garden bed won't have a bed size

faqs.question: Can I interact with the plants in my virtual garden?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can replace a plant, add a note, delete the plant, or view the plant's details.

faqs.question: How do I add seed packets?
faqs.answer: In the seed tab, you can add seed packets with details like weight, weight symbol, date added, and the amount left.

faqs.question: Are seeds grouped in any way?
faqs.answer: Yes, seeds are grouped by plant type, such as all tomato seeds together, all basil seeds together, etc.

faqs.question: What can I do in the 'More' tab?
faqs.answer: You can try out the premium version, purchase it, select the type of garden bed, add/delete planting zones, and access feedback and support options.

faqs.question: How do I provide feedback or report a bug?
faqs.answer: Tap on the feedback and support button to send an email to the developer at Banye.dev@gmail.com.

faqs.question: Can I see upcoming features of the app?
faqs.answer: Yes, tap on the 'Upcoming Features' button in the more tab to get a sneak peek of what the developers are working on.

faqs.question: How do I rate the app?
faqs.answer: Use the 'Rate App' button to leave a rating or review on the App Store.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of the premium version?
faqs.answer: The premium version allows for an unlimited number of gardens and seed packets, multiple notes per plant, no ads, and supports the app's development.

faqs.question: Can I try the premium version first before buying?
faqs.answer: Yes, Patch offers a 3 day trial for first time users.
